content: this beanie comes in 4 sizes sizing / finished measurements baby/toddler 14 around & 6-1/2 tall child small ages 3-10 17 around & 7-1/2 tall teen/adult small 19 around & 8-1/2 tall adult large 21 around & 8-1/2 tall you will need h-8 5 00mm hook or any size needed to obtain gauge 100-200 yards of worsted/aran/afghan 4 weight yarn stitches you need to know single_crochet half_double_crochet special stitch - explained in pattern pattern is written in us standard terms this pattern was tested but you can always contact me if you have any problems with the pattern i am happy to help if you have any questions please do not copy share or publish this pattern finished items may be sold i would very much appreciate it if you would credit aprile mazey for the pattern design and include a link to www thesteadyhandshop com thanks
